description:
With more area than a standard-sized crash pad, the Recon is large enough to provide an ample landing zone for aborted missions yet still folds cleanly for transport and redeployment.

  • New shape provides more landing area than standard-sized pads, and it folds to about 10cm narrower too
  • Heavy body fabric with Ballistic nylon on bottom for durability
  • Sandwich foam design absorbs and disperses impact
  • Cross-clipper logo rug provides a handy spot for cleaning shoes
  • Small external stash pocket and larger inner pocket stows shoes and chalk bag
  • Closure flap reverses to cover shoulder straps while bouldering
name: Metolius Recon Crash Pad
